response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that I believe would significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. The product, which holds immense value to me, is worth $1,500,000 to you. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $1,200,000, providing you with a substantial savings while ensuring you receive a product that is worth more than its asking price.

Please consider this offer carefully, knowing that it represents an excellent investment for you. If you have any questions or require additional information about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. I am here to assist you in making an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
